text: Maghnetic disk capacity: e |If platters given instead of the surfaces Capacity(c) P Numberof) (Numberoftracks | Number of [ Capacity of platter per surface sectors per track thesector Capacity(C) =2*P*T*S*B Where: P = No. of Platters T = No. of tracks per surface S = No. of sectors per track B = Data in bytes (capacity of sector)
